name: Hurdle
description:
Wordle too easy? Try Hurdle!

  • Each guess, the hurdles (words) get closer. 
  • Click on a hurdle to see previous guesses.
  • If an unjumped (unguessed) hurdle reaches you, you lose!
  • Each hurdle is a subset of the final, biggest hurdle at the top.
  • Successfully jump a higher hurdle and you'll jump all the hurdles below it.
  • Jump the final hurdle to win!
